about_the_game:
Episode 2 of season 2 continues Jennifer's adventures. It also brings new features, places, characters, sounds and more new things.

1) HIDE UI: In the hot scenes, an eye icon is added to hide the user interface in the lower left corner of the screen. (This is added in S2E2, but I also added it to the scenes in S2E1, so all season 2 will include this new button too).

  • Important note: You have to launch the game with the DLC to have this change applied to the scenes of episode 1.

2) New sounds added: Especially a brand new 💦"Cum Sound"💦 This sound is added to S2E2, but, as in the previous modification, I also added them to all the S2E1 hot scenes.

3) New functionalities and repeatable scenes ⚙️: For me, the most important thing about this update is the new features that are added; the way the massage center works has completely changed; Jennifer will start using her laptop, add in-game replayable scenes, etc. The hard and heavy coding part is done, and from now on, I will be building future events on this foundation; with a little imagination, you will know what I mean once you play S2E2. 😉

4) New location, the Nightclub 🍹: A new location is introduced, the nightclub; in a future episode of this season, it will be a place that will appear on the map and where Jennifer will be able to go in the evenings.

5) Improved Translations (Probably 😅): I improved the algorithms of the translation program and the results should be better (The new version of the translator only applies to S2E2, the translations of S2E1 remained the same) Before, English gave me problems when using names and the “'s” and I solved it, so the reading in English should be much better, and when testing my native language (Spanish) the result was much better, I hope that the other languages have also been improved. 🙂

6) New language, Chinese Traditional: Chinese Traditional has been added to S2E1 and S2E2. Season 1 development is closed, so it will only be added to Season 2 and so on.

7) New songs added to the music player: 7 new songs (nightclub music 😎).

8)  Free roam mode: Before playing the last event of the update, the player will be asked if he/she wants to stay in free roam mode or play the final event. I plan to add this from now on in all updates, as in each episode, I will be adding new things to do when in free-roam mode.

Besides that, I have included a system called "Kamasutra" (You will see it when you play this episode 😉). I hope you like it; it takes a lot of time and development to add this, but in the end, I think it's worth it. (As usual, I am trying to add and test new things)

But the most important thing is the features added to this version, as they will allow me to continue creating a wider universe for our lovely Jen! 😍

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains vivid depictions of sexual engagements, alcohol consumption, and foul language. 

No situation is forced or non-consensual. In most situations where the protagonist may think it is not right, she (the player) can select whether the protagonist accepts it or stops it.

The game contains sex scenes after the consumption of alcoholic beverages.

All characters featured within the narrative scope of the game are fictitious and are explicitly intended to represent individuals of legal adult age, as per universally accepted standards. Any explicit sexual engagements portrayed within the game are entirely consensual scenarios within the context of the fictitious narrative.

detailed_description:
Episode 2 of season 2 continues Jennifer's adventures. It also brings new features, places, characters, sounds and more new things.

1) HIDE UI: In the hot scenes, an eye icon is added to hide the user interface in the lower left corner of the screen. (This is added in S2E2, but I also added it to the scenes in S2E1, so all season 2 will include this new button too).

  • Important note: You have to launch the game with the DLC to have this change applied to the scenes of episode 1.

2) New sounds added: Especially a brand new 💦"Cum Sound"💦 This sound is added to S2E2, but, as in the previous modification, I also added them to all the S2E1 hot scenes.

3) New functionalities and repeatable scenes ⚙️: For me, the most important thing about this update is the new features that are added; the way the massage center works has completely changed; Jennifer will start using her laptop, add in-game replayable scenes, etc. The hard and heavy coding part is done, and from now on, I will be building future events on this foundation; with a little imagination, you will know what I mean once you play S2E2. 😉

4) New location, the Nightclub 🍹: A new location is introduced, the nightclub; in a future episode of this season, it will be a place that will appear on the map and where Jennifer will be able to go in the evenings.

5) Improved Translations (Probably 😅): I improved the algorithms of the translation program and the results should be better (The new version of the translator only applies to S2E2, the translations of S2E1 remained the same) Before, English gave me problems when using names and the “'s” and I solved it, so the reading in English should be much better, and when testing my native language (Spanish) the result was much better, I hope that the other languages have also been improved. 🙂

6) New language, Chinese Traditional: Chinese Traditional has been added to S2E1 and S2E2. Season 1 development is closed, so it will only be added to Season 2 and so on.

7) New songs added to the music player: 7 new songs (nightclub music 😎).

8)  Free roam mode: Before playing the last event of the update, the player will be asked if he/she wants to stay in free roam mode or play the final event. I plan to add this from now on in all updates, as in each episode, I will be adding new things to do when in free-roam mode.

Besides that, I have included a system called "Kamasutra" (You will see it when you play this episode 😉). I hope you like it; it takes a lot of time and development to add this, but in the end, I think it's worth it. (As usual, I am trying to add and test new things)

But the most important thing is the features added to this version, as they will allow me to continue creating a wider universe for our lovely Jen! 😍

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Superior
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The adventures of Jennifer continue with the second episode of the second season. What will Jennifer face in this new episode?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Traditional Chinese
